pages.text: When residing in our plane of existence, spirits experience $(thing)Essence Decay$(), the slow rot of their"body". The more powerful the spirit, the slower the decay, but only the most powerful can stop it entirely. Once fully decayed they are returned to $(thing)The Other Place$() and can only be re-summoned once fully recovered.

The summoner can slow or even stop essence decay by binding the spirit into an object, or summoning it into a living being. Additionally the pentacle used can influence the effects of essence decay to a degree.
